sect2.title: Introduction to kdebase
sect2.para: kdebase is the last mandatory package required for the K Desktop Environment. It provides various applications, infrastructure files and libraries.

sect4.title: Optional

sect2.title: Installation of kdebase
sect2.para: Note: You should ensure a 'nogroup' group exists on your system before performing the make install command, as kdebase installs a program with group ownership of 'nogroup'.

note.para: If you wish to create the API documentation and you have doxygen and Graphviz installed, make apidox must be done before make install.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdebase include kate, kcontrol, kdebugdialog, kdeprint, kdesu, kdm, kfind, khelpcenter, kicker, kinfocenter, kioslave, klipper, kmenuedit, konqueror, konsole, kpager, ksplashml, ksysguard, kwrite and kxkb.

sect3.title: kate
sect3.para: kate is a programmer's text editor for KDE.

sect3.title: kcontrol
sect3.para: kcontrol is the KDE Control Center.

sect3.title: kdebugdialog
sect3.para: kdebugdialog is a dialog box for managing diagnostic messages at runtime.

sect3.title: kdesu
sect3.para: kdesu is a graphical front end for the Unix su command.

sect3.title: kdm
sect3.para: kdm is the KDE display manager (a replacement for xdm).

sect3.title: kfind
sect3.para: kfind is an utility to find files.

sect3.title: khelpcenter
sect3.para: khelpcenter is the KDE help tool.

sect3.title: kicker
sect3.para: kicker is the KDE control panel.

sect3.title: kinfocenter
sect3.para: kinfocenter provides a centralized and convenient overview of your KDE and system settings.

sect3.title: kmenuedit
sect3.para: kmenuedit is an utility to rearrange or add items to the K-menu.

sect3.title: konqueror
sect3.para: konqueror is a filesystem and web browser.

sect3.title: konsole
sect3.para: konsole is a highly configurable X terminal emulator.

sect3.title: kpager
sect3.para: kpager provides a thumbnail view of all virtual desktops.

sect3.title: ksplashml
sect3.para: ksplashml is a splash screen that shows the progress of an application that is loading.

sect3.title: ksysguard
sect3.para: ksysguard is a network enabled task manager and system monitor application, with the additional functionality of top.

sect3.title: kwrite
sect3.para: kwrite is a text editor for KDE.

sect3.title: kxkb
sect3.para: kxkb is a keyboard layout switching utility based on X11 xkb extension.
